name: One week Sprint: Shrink
description:
Super short experimental game made to challenge myself to learn godot and complete something in a short time (~about 3-4 days after work hours)

Its pretty hard and has 1 level but, is beatable. 

Built with Godot & C#

Controls

Movement: wasd\ arrow keys  

Jump: Space Bar

Pause: Esc Key

Source Code:
https://github.com/musicm122/shrink
